about_the_game:
Simple rules bloom into endless puzzle possibilities in Petal Crash 2!

It's easy to get started: Throw blocks around your board and match them into bursts of color, sending other blocks flying. Line it up right and you can cause a cascading chain reaction of floral fireworks! Petal Crash takes a minute to learn, and years to master - and it'll be a blast the whole time!

In the fantasy land of Florea, seven magic flowers each found their way into the hands of an ordinary person with a dream, and set them on a journey to find their hearts' true desires. Colorful clashes marked where their paths crossed, and each found a way to fulfill their wishes - though they aren't the only ones with dreams, and there's more than one way to make a dream come true... ready or not, it's time for another Petal Crash!

Petal Crash 2 takes everything good about the first game to the next level. Streamlined mechanics make gameplay smoother than ever, and the action is easy to follow with new arcade style graphics. All game modes are making a comeback, including the original story mode, now with vibrant visual novel style portraits and new, extra expressive animations for every character.

There's plenty of arcade action to be had in Early Access, with more to come as the game develops - including built-in online play and a brand new adventure mode! Take your first steps with us on your new puzzle journey!
